Ergonomic Design: Design a laptop with an adjustable, ergonomic keyboard and mouse for enhanced comfort and minimization of strain during extended use.
Improved Display: Create a high-resolution, 4K or 8K display with HDR capabilities and superior contrast ratio for a more immersive viewing experience.
Multitasking with Multiple Displays: Introduce a slim, auxiliary display that can be attached to the main laptop for increased screen real estate.
Adaptive Audio: Develop a laptop with built-in, noise-cancellation technology and high-quality speakers to create a personalized audio experience.
Increased Security: Incorporate a facial or fingerprint recognition feature for secure access to the system, and implement advanced encryption methods to protect sensitive data.
